attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFADpEZTn59BPRJceB_description
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take the poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFAGbTA7C0WetdMhwq_name
attribs.current: Bites (swarm has more than half HP)

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFAGbTA7C0WetdMhwq_attack_target
attribs.current: one creature in the swarm's space

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFAGbTA7C0WetdMhwr_name
attribs.current: Bites (swarm has half HP or less)

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFAGbTA7C0WetdMhwr_attack_target
attribs.current: one creature in the swarm's space

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFAGbTA7C0WetdMhws_description
attribs.current: The swarm can't use its blindsight while deafened.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFAGbTA7C0WetdMhwt_description
attribs.current: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFAGbTA7C0WetdMhwu_description
attribs.current: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: Charmed, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Prone, Restrained, Stunned

attribs.name: npc_type
attribs.current: Medium swarm of tiny beasts, Unaligned

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFAGbTA7C0WetdMhwq_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +4, Reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFAGbTA7C0WetdMhwr_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +4, Reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFAK-6Mnf6n9-Gq9zN_description
attribs.current: While in sunlight, the urd has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFAK-6Mnf6n9-Gq9zO_description
attribs.current: The urd has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the urd's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFAUZNSKGM3styHt4u_description
attribs.current: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFAUZNSKGM3styHt4v_description
attribs.current: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
